request.description:
Run docker compose on the following

version: "3.9"services: fhir-server: image: hapiproject/hapi:v6.4.0 ports: - "8080:8080" environment: - hapi.fhir.install_transitive_ig_dependencies=false - hapi.fhir.fhir_version=R5 - hapi.fhir.implementationguides.epi.name=hl7.fhir.uv.emedicinal-product-info - hapi.fhir.implementationguides.epi.version=1.0.0-ballot - hapi.fhir.implementationguides.epi.url=http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/emedicinal-product-info/package.tgz ember: image: jkiddo/ember:latest environment: - location=http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-eu/gravitate-health/package.tgz - serverBase=http://fhir-server:8080/fhir

item.name: Find ePI Composition based on identifier
